title: @riot What is happening with the servers?
body: i am currently unable to login to the server is anyone else experiencing this same issue?

replies.body: There was indeed maintenance over the night with some downtime, but everything is online at this point.  Our [server status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)page would be the best place to stay updated on service on-goings.  Let me know if you still have any issues logging in!
still unable to log in. did cmd prompts and still no go
Is this happening at the login screen, or elsewhere?  Are you receiving any error messages?  I'm happy to help!

cannot connect to pvp.net (yes login screen)
I have done all the required steps and it still doesn't connect. :(

Thanks, just wanted to make sure!  At this point, your network might be having an issue connecting to the authentication server to get you in.  As a first step, please go over our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to get this fixed up.  This should resolve the issue, but let me know!
I fixed the ports and did the cmd prompts. the clock is fine. its still not working

No worries, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help find out what's going on.  We can also get some context through a set of logs which can be obtained through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), and attach it to the ticket.  We'll respond asap!
There's a scheduled maintenance right now. I still want to know what the maintenance is for, but you can check the service status link on the left.

> [{quoted}](name=EreinionofNoldor,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FzEGqese,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-03T04:24:52.619+0000)
>
> There's a scheduled maintenance right now. I still want to know what the maintenance is for, but you can check the service status link on the left.

The scheduled maintenance was for 4am PST. This is a different problem that Riot is now aware of.
